name: PuppetShow: The Face of Humanity Collector's Edition
name_original: PuppetShow: The Face of Humanity Collector's Edition
description:
PuppetShow: The Face of Humanity Collector's Edition is a casual adventure game developed by ERS Game Studios. It came out on 21-01-2016. Big Fish Games published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
PuppetShow: The Face of Humanity Collector's Edition is available on PC.
